## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderdefaultinserter">IRBuilderDefaultInserter</a></>}>
This provides the default implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a> &#39;InsertHelper&#39; method that is called whenever an instruction is created by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a> and needs to be inserted. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderdefaultinserter/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuildercallbackinserter">IRBuilderCallbackInserter</a></>}>
Provides an &#39;InsertHelper&#39; that calls a user-provided callback after performing the default insertion. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuildercallbackinserter/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fmfsource">FMFSource</a></>}>

</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l02688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2688"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2689"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This provides a uniform API for creating instructions and inserting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2690"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// them into a basic block: either at the end of a BasicBlock, or at a specific</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// iterator location in a block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2692"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2693"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that the builder does not expose the full generality of LLVM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2694"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instructions.  For access to extra instruction properties, use the mutators</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2695"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (e.g. setVolatile) on the instructions after they have been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2696"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// created. Convenience state exists to specify fast-math flags and fp-math</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2697"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tags.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2698"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2699"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The first template argument specifies a class to use for creating constants.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2700"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This defaults to creating minimally folded constants.  The second template</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2701"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// argument allows clients to specify custom insertion hooks that are called on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2702"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// every newly created insertion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2703"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FolderTy = ConstantFolder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2704"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InserterTy = IRBuilderDefaultInserter&gt;</span></CodeLine>
